QuestData.Title: The Force of Neltharaku
QuestData.Description: Take this enchanted nethervine crystal and make your way back to Dragonmaw Fortress. Once there, seek out the enslaved drakes and invoke the magic of the nethervine crystal. My own energies will pour forth, causing the drakes to break free from the bond of their captors. When you see that the drake has broken free, help it defeat its captor! It will most assuredly be weak from the imprisonment.$B$BRelease all that you can find and return to me, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Neltharaku, flying high above Netherwing Fields in Shadowmoon Valley, wants you to free 5 Enslaved Netherwing Drakes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Waste no time, we have much work to do!
QuestData.RewardText: <Neltharaku laughs.>$B$BThe orcs must have been shocked to see the drakes turn on them in such a manner. Well done, $n. Perhaps you truly are the hero of our flight.
